page.title: 11RELIGION IN DUDLEY (2)
page.content: At{St. Josephs R.C.Primary School}we questioned repesentatives of 66 families .There were 44 Roman Catholics, 13 Church of England, 2 Methodists and 1 Salvaton Army.29 families attend church every week,19 occasionally, 18 never and 5 children regulaly attend Sunday School. This is a list of{places of worship within our 12 km2 grid,1 Christadelphian Hall, 4 Baptist Churches, 7 Churches of England, 1 Jehovah's Witness Hall, 8 Methodist Churches, 1 Mosque, 1 Roman Catholic Church, 1 Salvation Army Citadel, 1 Sikh Temple, 1 United Reformed Church,1 Free Church, 1 Seventh Day Adventist Hall and 1 New Testament Church of God. In the borough of Dudley there are also 13 Church of England Primary schools and 1 Secondary school.
